bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR SHARING GAINS TO PROMOTE SALES THROUGH EVALUATION CONTENTS OF GOODS ON WEB SITE

nplcit.text: "Server." Microsoft Computer Dictionary. 5th ed. 2002. p. 474. (3 pages)

abstract.p: The present invention provides a system and method for sharing profits with beneficiaries designated by a recommender who evaluates goods of an on-line shopping mall or an on-line portal site etc. (hereinafter, an e-trading system), when a purchaser connects to the e-trading platform and buys goods of the e-trading platform through the evaluation contents. The system includes a web server for administrating general purchasing procedures and performing other functions, an information providing arrangement for providing access to information on the goods including a beneficiary identifying code by connecting to the sales web page of the e-trading platform, and a profit sharing server for distributing the profit to the designated beneficiary, when any purchaser buys the goods or services at the web page of the e-trading platform including the beneficiary identifying codes through the recommendation contents.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and method for sharing gains to promote sales through evaluation contents of goods on web site
SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR SHARING GAINS TO PROMOTE SALES THROUGH EVALUATION CONTENTS OF GOODS ON WEB SITE

abstract.p: A system and a method for sharing gains through recommendation contents in a website are provided to share the gains generated from purchase induced through the recommendation contents to a receiver appointed from a recommender making the recommendation contents according to a sharing rate if the third person buys recommended goods after viewing the recommendation contents. A web server(111) registers the recommendation contents by receiving the recommendation contents, a recommending goods list, and the sharing rate, includes goods introduction/sale webpages including a receiver recognition code, and performs an EC(Electronic Commerce) function through the webpages. A recommendation content management server(112) links and manages the recommending goods list of the recommendation contents and the goods introduction/sale webpage.

A gain sharing server(113) shares a part of the gains according to the purchase by the sharing rate in case that a buyer buys the goods by connecting to the goods introduction/sale webpage including the receiver recognition code through the recommendation contents.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR SHARING GAINS TO PROMOTE SALES THROUGH EVALUATION CONTENTS OF GOODS ON WEB SITE
System and Method for Sharing Gains to Promote Sales Through Evaluation Contents of Goods on Web Site

abstract.p: The present invention provides a system and method for sharing profits with beneficiaries designated by a recommender who evaluates goods of an on-line shopping mall or an on-line portal site etc. (hereinafter, an e-trading system), when a purchaser connects to the e-trading platform and buys goods of the e-trading platform through the evaluation contents. The system comprises a web server for administrating general purchasing procedures of registration, search, order, refund and delivery confirmation for goods, registering recommendation contents written by a recommender, a beneficiary, a profit sharing rate and a recommended goods list, and showing a sales web page of an e-trading platform
information providing means for providing the linking means with information on the goods including a beneficiary identifying code by connecting to the sales web page of the e-trading platform

and a profit sharing server for distributing the profit to the designated beneficiary, when any purchaser buys the goods or services at the web page of the e-trading platform including the beneficiary identifying codes through the recommendation contents.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR SHARING GAINS TO PROMOTE SALES THROUGH EVALUATION CONTENTS OF GOODS ON WEB SITE
SYSTEME ET PROCEDE DE PARTICIPATION AUX BENEFICES AFIN DE PROMOUVOIR LES VENTES PAR LE BIAIS DE CONTENUS D'EVALUATION DE BIENS SUR SITE WEB

abstract.p: The present invention provides a system and method for sharing profits with beneficiaries designated by a recommender who evaluates goods of an on-line shopping mall or an on-line portal site etc. (hereinafter, an e-trading system), when a purchaser connects to the e-trading platform and buys goods of the e-trading platform through the evaluation contents. The system comprises a web server for administrating general purchasing procedures of registration, search, order, refund and delivery confirmation for goods, registering recommendation contents written by a recommender, a beneficiary, a profit sharing rate and a recommended goods list, and showing a sales web page of an e-trading platform
information providing means for providing the linking means with information on the goods including a beneficiary identifying code by connecting to the sales web page of the e-trading platform

and a profit sharing server for distributing the profit to the designated beneficiary, when any purchaser buys the goods or services at the web page of the e-trading platform including the beneficiary identifying codes through the recommendation contents.

L'invention concerne un système et un procédé de participation aux bénéfices dans lequel les bénéficiaires sont désignés par un recommandeur qui évalue les biens sur une galerie marchande en ligne ou sur un site portail en ligne, etc (ci-après dénommé système de commerce électronique), lorsqu'un acheteur se connecte à la plate-forme de commerce électronique et achète des biens présentés sur la plate-forme électronique par le biais de contenus d'évaluation.

Le système comprend un serveur Web servant à administrer des procédures d'achat générales d'enregistrement, de recherche, de commande, de réapprovisionnement et de confirmation de livraison des biens, à enregistrer des contenus de recommandation écrits par un recommandeur, un bénéficiaire, un taux de participation aux bénéfices et une liste de biens recommandés, et à afficher une page Web de ventes sur une plate-forme de commerce électronique

l'invention se rapporte également à des moyens de distribution d'informations conçus pour fournir des moyens de liaison avec des informations de produits comprenant un code d'identification du bénéficiaire par connexion à la page Web des ventes de la plate-forme électronique

et un serveur de participation aux bénéfices conçu pour distribuer les gains au bénéficiaire désigné, quand un acheteur achète les biens ou les services sur la page Web de la plate-forme électronique comprenant les codes d'identification du bénéficiaire à l'aide des contenus de recommandation.
